Articles.Content:
Okay, I'm back with a new rocket.

I have been working on the Aurora X heavy and also this rocket

This rocket worked better and has a much lower part count

So here we go!

This is an upgrade of the original Aurora X
I originally plan on making the aurora X heavy but the rocket is still under construction and shakes itself apart too often
The Aurora X had some issues involving it going booms when making turns
I have fixed that along with some other issues
I've also reduced the part count =)
Note: it was designed for orbital flight of heavy vehicles, it was not designed for interplanetary flights. just fit some NERVs in the payload bay for interplanetary travel

Edited December 18, 2022 by Smart Boy
add pictures

23 hours ago, Smart Boy said:

Okay, I'm back with a new rocket.

I have been working on the Aurora X heavy and also this rocket

This rocket worked better and has a much lower part count

So here we go!

This is an upgrade of the original Aurora X
I originally plan on making the aurora X heavy but the rocket is still under construction and shakes itself apart too often
The Aurora X had some issues involving it going booms when making turns
I have fixed that along with some other issues
I've also reduced the part count =)
Note: it was designed for orbital flight of heavy vehicles, it was not designed for interplanetary flights. just fit some NERVs in the payload bay for interplanetary travel

Holy cow! That's a lot of power!

Update:

I discovered an issue with the rocket:

Upper stage can blow up lower stage (Can sometimes blow an engine on upper stage)

I was unlucky and accidentally blew up most of my engines =(
